skills: Computers and Electronics, Administration and Management, Critical Thinking, Negotiation, Persuasion, Sales and Marketing
summary: Accomplished and energetic leader with strong organizational and prioritization abilities. Areas of expertise include Meeting Goals, Negotiation and Selling to Customer Needs.
work_experience: This individual served as a Sales Manager from 01/2010 to Current, where they resolved customer complaints, directed and coordinated sales activities, managed staffing and training, determined price schedules, conferred with customers on equipment needs, reviewed operational records, advised dealers, monitored customer preferences, and coordinated advertising, accounting, and shipping operations. Previously, as an Emergency Road Service Technician from 07/2007 to 03/2010, they identified and inflated tires, balanced and remounted wheels, raised vehicles, repaired tires, drove service trucks, and assisted mechanics. From 03/2005 to 09/2007, as a Wholesale Food Supplier, they sold and kept sales records, maintained various logs, drove delivery vehicles, processed meat (wrapping, weighing, cutting, trimming, inspecting), handled sales and money collection, managed purchase orders, analyzed prices, studied inventory, negotiated terms, consulted with managers, delivered items, wrote contracts, informed customers of new products, and resolved complaints.
